Name: Winnie Wagner
Text: My 1st time there, and the staff was very welcoming. My tech was very knowledgeable and caring, bc my old set was a hot mess. I will definitely be going back for my fill ins. Thank you to all the staff for a job well done!!!!

Name: Judy Beck
Text: I found the best nail place in Pasadena.

Name: Iluvmyself Chowww
Text: Love the experience here, the people here are so friendly otherwise I get my nails done here a lot and it is worth the money, absolutely recommended it!!!

Name: Angel a
Text: Nice service, good place, new boss maybe 4 months. I like how they do the simple pedicure.I am satisfied with the service. Very modern, highly responsive presentation and color scheme and offers great water bottles.

Name: kd 1n
Text: Newly renovated, and I love the new owner (Selena) she’s really nice and sweet, and she’s really doing a great job doing my nails. 10/10 I recommend this place!

Name: Lena DiFatta
Text: I had a great experience at this nail salon. Despite a initial hiccup with my nails, the owner personally fixed them, ensuring I left satisfied. They even gave me a certificate for any inconvenience. I'll definitely be returning and recommend you do too!

Name: Amanda Colbert- Arold
Text: Fantastic!!! Did my nails one day and brought my daughter back next day. Very friendly and nails look great.

Name: Galena Deters
Text: Awesome service. They are very nice and accommodating. We are new to the area and have been looking for a new nail place and I think we found a winner! Great work as well as a great atmosphere.

Name: Angela Acampora
Text: I got a fill and a really cute design. The new owners are so friendly and welcoming and the salon is newly renovated. So glad I found my new go-to nail place!

Name: Yancy Cobb
Text: This place is under new ownership, and they are GREAT! The place have been remodeled and looks amazing. The service was great. A+++
